water_leak.description: Indicates if any water leaks are detected. 0 means no leak, 1 means leak detected.

battery_level.description: Represents the battery status. 0 means normal level, 1 means low battery warning.

nas.description: Shows the status of the NAS device. 0 means it is offline or unreachable, 1 means it is online and functioning.

light_level.description: Represents the ambient light level. Higher values mean brighter environments.

occupancy.description: Indicates the number of detected occupants in the room, from 0 up to 9.

temperature.description: Current temperature reading in degrees Celsius.

humidity.description: Current humidity level as a percentage.

motion_detected.description: Indicates if motion has been detected. 0 means no motion, 1 means motion detected.

smoke_detected.description: Indicates presence of smoke. 0 means normal, 1 means smoke detected.

window_status.description: Shows the current status of the window. Can be opened, closed, locked, or in transition.

shatter_status.description: Represents the state of a shatter-sensitive surface such as glass. Can be opened, closed, or transitioning.

fan_status.description: Current speed or load of the fan device. Actions can start or stop it.

water_leak.description: Indicates if any water leaks are detected. 0 means no leak, 1 means leak detected.

water_leak_sensor_battery.description: Battery level of the water leak sensor expressed as a percentage.

stove_status.description: Indicates whether the stove is off (0) or on (1).

microwave_status.description: Indicates whether the microwave is off (0) or on (1).

fridge_temp.description: Represents the current temperature inside the fridge in degrees Celsius.

kettle_status.description: Describes the current status of the kettle based on temperature and water level.

washer_status.description: Indicates whether the washer is on (1) or off (0).

dryer_status.description: Indicates whether the dryer is on (1) or off (0).

car_presence.description: Indicates whether a car is present (1) or not (0)

door_status.description: Current state of the door. Can be open, closed, or locked.

tv_status.description: Indicates whether the TV is currently turned on or off.

ac_status.description: Indicates the power state of the AC. 0 means off, 1 means on.

sprinkler_status.description: Represents the operational state of the sprinkler: 1 for active/on, 0 for inactive/off

water_temperature.description: Temperature of water in degrees Celsius, typically measured in pipes or tanks

vac_status.description: Status of the vacuum system: 'on' when active, 'off' when idle or disabled

sprinkler_controller_status.description: Indicates the current status of the sprinkler controller: 1 for on, 0 for off

car_presence.description: Indicates whether a car is present (1) or not (0)

dew_point.description: Dew point temperature in degrees Celsius

wind_wave_height.description: Height of wind waves in meters

wind_wave_period.description: Period of wind waves in seconds

swell_wave_height.description: Height of swell waves in meters

sea_level_height_msl.description: Sea level height above mean sea level in meters

sea_surface_temperature.description: Temperature of sea surface in degrees Celsius

ocean_current_velocity.description: Velocity of ocean current in m/s
